/>
XII.i.3.E.2.a
.
Claims Filed More Than One Year After Initial Report or Finding
If the claim is filed more than one year after the date the report or finding was made, the commencing date is the date the claim was filed if otherwise in order.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E - Allowance, Allotments, or Service Pay Under 38 U.S.C. 5110(j)
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E
